availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Calhoun, McLean County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Sarah L. Wright Atchison. Father of Philip T. Atchison, Nancy J. Atchison, Sarah L. Atchison, John L. Atchison, and William G. Atchison.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 6-7. Find A Grave, "[Name] ([Birth]-[Death])," Memorial #89170775, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=89170775&ref=acom (accessed September 15, 2017). Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
